00045         {
00046             StockItem si = new StockItem("0000", "Dummy Item", "None", 0.0, 0, 0);
00047             this.StockItems.Add(si);

00054         public void DeleteStockItem(StockItem si)
00055         {
00056             if (this.StockItems.Contains(si))
00057             {
00058                 this.StockItems.Remove(si);
00059             }
00060             else
00061             {
00062                 throw new ArgumentException("Item to delete not present.");
00063             }
00064         }

00202         public void OrderItem(StockItem si, BankAccount ba, int quantity)
00203         {
00204             if (ba != null && si != null)
00205             {
00206                 bool buyExcessStock = false;
00207                 if (quantity == 0)
00208                 {
00209                     quantity = si.RequiredStock;
00210                 }
00211                 else
00212                 {
00213                     buyExcessStock = true;
00214                 }
00215                 double priceOfOrder = quantity * si.UnitCost;
00216                 if (priceOfOrder < ba.Balance)
00217                 {
00218                     ba.Transfer(1, priceOfOrder);
00219                     si.CurrentStock += quantity;
00220                     /*
00221                      * Allow the user to buy more than needed.
00222                      */
00223                     if (buyExcessStock)
00224                     {
00225                         if (quantity > si.RequiredStock)
00226                         {
00227                             si.RequiredStock = 0;
00228                         }
00229                     }
00230                 }
00231                 else
00232                 {
00233                     throw new NotEnoughFundsException(String.Format("Not enough founds on bank account {0} to place order for {1} £", ba.AccountNumber, priceOfOrder));
00234                 }
00235             }
00236             else
00237             {
00238                 throw new ArgumentNullException("Stock item or bank account provided do not exist.");
00239             }
00240         }
00241

00255                 throw new ArgumentNullException("Provided bank account does not exist.");
00256             }
00257         }

00281         internal void LoadStockItemsFromFile(string filePath)
00282         {
00283             this.StockItemHandler.ReadFilePath = filePath;
00284             IList<StockItem> stockItems = StockItemHandler.LoadFromFile(new StockItem());
00285             this.StockItems.Clear();
00286             foreach (StockItem item in stockItems)
00287             {
00288                 this.StockItems.Add(item);
00289             }
00290         }
00291 
00297         internal void LoadBankAccountsFromFile(string filePath)
00298         {
00299             this.BankAccountHandler.ReadFilePath = filePath;
00300             IList<BankAccount> bankAccounts = BankAccountHandler.LoadFromFile(new BankAccount());
00301             this.BankAccounts.Clear();
00302             foreach (BankAccount item in bankAccounts)
00303             {
00304                 this.BankAccounts.Add(item);
00305             }
00306         }
